author: @seekerj1643
text: As a person that is just finishing up my Master’s I will say that from a learning standpoint it wasn’t necessary but it does get you a ton of interviews and opportunities. With the Google Data Analytics Certification I didn’t get much attention at all.

author: @Narrow-Pather
text: Bill Gates Mark Zuckerberg, Steve Jobs, George Bush Jr., and the like show that depending on your reasoning for attaining the degree, you may not need one.

author: @HorseEngine999
text: Uni education has become too redundant and cannot compare with the quality online courses and tutorials provide nowadays. It's only saving grace is the physical exams.

author: @wylee5984
text: College is bullshit it is just extra meaningless stress. You don’t need to be able to solve linear algebra questions for exams

author: @jordanmartinetti8224
text: The awesome thing about this industry is how accessible it is. There’s open source software and education, short courses or certifications, and then full on degrees. There is a learning method for everyone that has the passion for it.

author: @petsland6107
text: But how can I show my Luring.. I have to show projects. Can you please help us to do projects on data analytics.

author: @LuisFernando-kw4yz
text: Google's Data Analytics Certificate got me started!

author: @scifiworkshop
text: Hopefully a degree helps though, since I just spent years of my life getting one.

author: @lakshmanshankar
text: I am going to college for degree and study on the nights for my job. I learn mostly from YouTube and creating project ( less than 10% comes from college). In college they don't care about your career but you should.

author: @gdj777
text: Many College thats cater to working adults include access to Udemy, Pluralsight, Udacity, etc.  So, is their curriculum lacking that they need to provide those?  Then why pay tens of thousands$$ for knowledege that can be obtained for $40 bucks a month or even free. With some exceptions, Seems at this point college has turned in a Gov enabled money-grab.
